about.title: about
description: I’m Abdullah Al Mamun(Rajon), distinguished by the esteemed, Top-Rated WordPress developer with more than 7 years of comprehensive experience in WordPress design and development, Site Migrations, Speed Optimization, Site Security, Plugin & Theme Customization and eCommerce solutions.

I am committed to delivering exceptional WordPress development services, with a focus on cultivating strong client relationships that foster satisfaction and trust. Contact me today to discover how I can effectively and efficiently address your WordPress development needs.
In my free time, I love to travel and discover new places, catch up with friends, read books, stay active through exercise, recharge my batteries, and explore new possibilities!

contacts.title: contacts
contacts.text: I’m interested in freelance opportunities. If it's a yes, it would definitely be a long-term & profitable partnership for both of us. Let's chat!

description: I’m a self-taught front-end developer based in dhaka, Bangladesh. I can build responsive websites from the ground up, transforming them into modern and user-friendly web experiences.
For over a year, I have passionately transformed my creativity and expertise into building websites, assisting numerous clients in establishing a strong online presence.
I always strive to learn about the newest technologies and frameworks.

list: I like summer more than winter
I often bike with my friends
I like pizza and fried chicken
